document.full_text: a new plant in brooklyn's canarsie section is expected to reduce sewage discharges into jamaica bay and paerdegat basin by about 70 percent a year, or 1.2 billion gallons.
document.title: relief for noses in brooklyn and queens
lines_and_colors: a new plant in brooklyn's canarsie section is expected to reduce sewage discharges into jamaica bay and paerdegat basin by about 70 percent a year, or 1.2 billion gallons.
